name: mirror mirror (pluto :0)
description:
hello this game is for the 5 years o bitsy game jam! based on the theme "reflection" :D

this game was made with the beta bitsy 3d editor by aloelazoe!

this game is doesnt really make a lot of sense lol, i made it super quickly and made the story as i made the game, so sorry if it doesnt really make sense :)

- use the arrow keys/wasd to move, and use the mouse to look around :D
